name: Escape from Captain Zombie - Horror Escape
name_original: Escape from Captain Zombie - Horror Escape
description: You wake up in a small room, there is nothing outside the window, you don't know where you are. Your task is to escape from this terrifying place at any cost! To win you have to be smart, you have to explore the house, find the right items to escape. Explore and use items. Look for keys or think of other ways to open locked doors. Discover exciting secrets. Do your best not to become another victim of a serial killer. Be very careful not to make noise, he can hear everything!
